text: "I Gotta Know" is a 1956 song by American rockabilly singer Wanda Jackson and was relased as a single by Capitol Records. It was later included on her 1960 album Rockin' with Wanda. ==References== Category:1956 songs Category:Rock ballads Category:Rockabilly songs Category:Wanda Jackson songs
title: I Gotta Know (Wanda Jackson song)
